appendix.title: Document History
appendix.para: The exact file history is recorded in the manual module in our CVS tree; see http://sourceforge.net/cvs/?group_id=9028

revdescription.para: Original was in Russian, translated by Dmitry Borodin (MegaTranslations). Raw translation edited and converted to DocBook, as this revison (1.1), by Helen Borrie.
This revision distributed as a PDF build only, for review by Dmitry Yemanov, et al.
Reviewers, please pay attention to the comments like this: Editor's note :: The sky is falling, take cover!
